item.title: Too much rain
item.description: There's been a lot of rain. I moved most of the potted peppers out of the works of it, but I left the cloth pot peppers out in it. It looks like that was a bad idea. The habenero does not look good and the jalepeno looks like it is going to lose all of it's leaves.
item.dc:creator: Michael Lerch

item.title: Transfer Orange Blossom
item.description: I transferred the Orange Blossom to a 5 gallon bucket today. Hope he prefers that.
item.dc:creator: Michael Lerch

item.title: Transplanted (picture)
item.description:
Transplanted from planters into larger pots. Approximately 12 inch pots.

Here's a picture
item.dc:creator: Michael Lerch

item.title: Purchased plants
item.description:
Purchased Plants!

  • 2 Sun sugar tomatoes
  • 1 Orange blossom tomato
  • 4 pack of jalepeno
  • 4 pack of habenero
item.dc:creator: Michael Lerch
